title: Top 5 iOS & Android Apps of March 2022!

media:group.media:title: Top 5 iOS & Android Apps of March 2022!
media:group.media:description:
These are five of our favorite Android and iOS apps of March 2022. Which app is your favorite?

iOS:

Structured: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/structured-day-planner/id1499198946 
Bio Link: https://apps.apple.com/app/bio-link-link-in-bio/id1573294119 
Photo Studio: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/photo-studio-by-square/id1593757938 
Substack Reader: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/substack-reader/id1581650857 
DailyBean: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/dailybean-simplest-journal/id1553223828 

Android:

Tilla: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pavelrekun.tilla 
Spectra: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mahersafadi.spectra 
Podify: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sebschaef.podify 
Wallique: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dev.introdructor.wallique.app 
Camaliot: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.iiasa.camaliot
